hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1602 a.n today's date is June
27th 2018 and the thought of the episode
is IMF and China prepare for financial
shocks and economic panic let's get into
the economic collapse financial news now
for the past couple of months maybe in a
year now the central banks and the
corporate media and everyone else has
been saying how dangerous crypto
currencies were that this is coming from
the banks and the central banks we need
to protect the people they cannot
purchase these using their credit cards
their debit cards and this is very very
scary for the people because they don't
know what they're getting themselves
into and then all of a sudden we started
to see crypto currency manipulated in a
way that we've never seen before where
certain entities were throwing a huge
amount of cryptocurrency mainly Bitcoin
and selling it and bringing down the
price now remember they accumulated a
lot of this cryptocurrency from mount
cogs and they use this to basically look
make cryptocurrency look volatile now
let's put all this together here because
they were telling us as Bitcoin was
going up that this is something very
scary Facebook Google and many others
said we're not gonna allow anyone to
advertise crypto currencies the central
bank was out there telling you that
criminals are using it terrorists are
using it it's absolutely awful and all
of a sudden weeks we saw crypto
currencies become very very volatile and
they went up and they went down they
went up when they went down and
basically mission accomplished they made
everyone feel that Oh crypto currencies
this is too volatile it's dangerous you
shouldn't be in it now we see since that
whole entire episode is over the same
exact companies are saying now that it's
ok to advertise crypto currencies they
still have a ban on icos
but crypto currencies like
Facebook right now is saying that they
will allow people to advertise and of
course they work they rework their terms
of service and you know they've that
they're letting people and warning
people that these are dangerous of
course they allow gambling on there and
that's not dangerous but what we're
seeing right now is a complete and utter
manipulation of this market and they put
fear into almost everyone and this is
what they wanted to do because this is
how they move everyone away from maybe
another currency another asset that
would go up against the central bank's
assets their currency just like gold and
silver what they've been what are they
been saying for many many years about
gold and silver then it's a barbarous
relic nobody owns it for jewelry you
don't want to have it and of course
central banks around the world countries
around the world
they've been amassing a huge amount of
gold and silver and we see right now
that this is all part of their scheme to
manipulate everyone into doing what they
want and this is why now all of a sudden
you're gonna see Google you're gonna see
Facebook you're gonna see oh the banks
are saying ok now you can purchase
crypto currencies because what they've
done here is they put it into everyone's
you know brain that cryptocurrencies are
bad that's what they wanted to do from
the very beginning now if you want to
learn more about crypto currencies you
can go to the x-22 reports cool calm you
can look at the website there I'll
explain everything there you can also if
you're already know anything about
crypto currencies and you want to
continue with that and learn how to
trade and how to sell off and purchase
crypto currencies before they go down or
up I would go into the trading room
again it's on the same site you can look
at the website all you need to do is
type in X 22 reports cool calm and it
will bring you to that area now here in
the United States we are seeing the
economy continually break down right now
we're seeing core durable goods they are
declining right now now once again we've
seen this two times now this is the
second month in
rrrow that core durable goods have
slumped and this is you know you washer
your dryers the big-ticket items and
what we're seeing is these big-ticket
items where you're normally not taking
out a loan to purchases yes they have
finance plans and things like that but
normally you're just paying cash for
these people are not going out and
purchasing these big-ticket items
anymore
and there's they're slowing up because
they realize they need to hold on to
their funds and they really don't want
to put this on their credit card they
don't want to take another loan out and
we see that this is starting to slow up
right now if we look at the housing
market what do we see well we know that
new home sales they were revised and
every other place was declining except
for the south we saw existing homes
declining and now we see pending homes
declining so we're starting to see that
the housing market is in a downward
trajectory what else do we see happening
in the housing market prices are
starting to come down you know what's
going to happen when prices come down
people get nervous traffic's gonna dry
up people are gonna say you know
something I'm not gonna sell my house
right now this is how it all begins and
we need to remember something very
important about pending home sales they
are an indicator on what the housing
market is going to do it's a sales
leading indicator because they they
track the contract signings so purchases
of existing homes are tabulated when a
deal closes typically a month or two
later and this is how they can judge
what's going to happen right now and
when we look at us pending home sales
they did reach a peak around 2015-2016
and ever since then they've been
declining every single month and again
we've seen this before this is what
happened back in 2006 when everything
peaked everything started to come down
prices started to come down existing
home sales started to come down pending
home sales contract signings declined
now remember this is all declining
during a period when real estate is
supposed to be booming this is the
summer months the flowers are out people
are mowing their lawn the houses are
looking great it's warm to go look at
homes people want to get in their homes
before school starts so they can move
their whole entire family it's easier to
move when you have warm weather and
guess what everything's going the
opposite way now on top of that as
everyone knows we have interest rates
moving up mortgage applications or
declining reef eyes are declining and
this whole thing is just gonna end in
one gigantic disaster like it did back
because what we're seeing right now is
that this whole thing is one gigantic
bubble now minuchin is out there and he
is saying that the market got their
messages mixed up when he came out and
said that he's going to be putting or
trump is gonna be putting the ban on
China's investment in the US and he is
out there saying that
yeah the messages got mixed up he
apologized saying that this is not what
he really meant to say and it seems like
this is the second time he's doing this
where these things just got mixed up and
he said something that might not have
been true or he wasn't on the same page
as everyone else which I find very
interesting Lagarde is out there and she
is saying the eurozone countries they
must prepare for financial shocks
together now I thought coming from the
IMF if we go back a couple of months
that the economy was doing fantastically
that's gonna grow tremendously I mean
you know they put out their projections
of course they're always wrong and now
she's on the other end and we discussed
this a little bit before where she
saying that the eurozone countries they
should work together to build resilience
against future economic downturns now
why would there be future economic
downturns if they're telling us the
economy and all the countries are doing
fantastically because they understand
this is this whole thing was
supposed to happen we were supposed to
be in some type of an event right now
where the world was going to be engulfed
in some type of war something else to
cover up this whole entire system
breaking up and collapsing so she's out
there saying that the EU countries with
the euro they should have a rainy day
fund and we discussed this before where
they're saying that all the country
should you know raise taxes cut spending
and put money into a rainy day fund when
everything falls apart she also added
that it was critical for European
countries to prepare for taking on any
industries that might move from Britain
following the brexit so we have the
brexit going on we have Italy pulling
away and they're very nervous about this
what they're really saying and what
she's really saying is that what they
once had is breaking apart and the
remaining EU countries if you want this
to continue on well you're gonna have to
support it somehow someway now there was
a leaked report from a Chinese
government backed think-tank which is
warning of a potential financial panic
in the world's second largest economy
which is China a sign that some members
of the nations policy elite are grown
concerned as market turbulence and trade
tensions increased now according to the
study by the National Institute for
finance and development that was seen by
different news outlets bond defaults
liquidity shortages and the recent
plunge in financial markets posed
particular dangers at a time of rising
US interest rates and a trade spat with
Washington the think-tank also warned
that leveraged purchases of shares of
stocks bought with margin loans have
reached levels not seen since 2015 when
a market crashed erased about 5 trillion
of value the think-tank concluded that
China state council should be ready to
implement any market support measures in
coordination with the bank essential
bank and other regulators and they're
saying they should even maybe contact
the Polly
or other government ministries to
prepare to prepare for what is coming
now it's very interesting because when
we look at Obama's presidency the IMF
thus the main central banks the biz they
never talked about this they just told
us how this recovery was do it was was
fantastic that things were moving in the
right direction everything was great
then Trump came in became president and
basically all of us on everything
started to turn a little bit that the
economy is not doing that well and of
course they're blaming it on the tariffs
that everything is breaking apart that
the EU nation should protect themselves
the biz is which is the central bank of
all central banks is separating
themselves from the banking industry
saying that yet they're insolvent and
we're starting to hear a lot of this out
there and at the same time they're
telling us that the world economy is
going to grow so basically what they're
doing right now is they're letting you
know that something is coming and this
is what they like to do they like the
Telegraph this in advance to say hey we
told you that this was coming
we also told you that everything was
fine but we told you this was coming so
we're not to blame well they are to
blame this is their system they created
it we are under a central banking system
where they spread debt to every single
country but every country into debt and
basically the central bank owns these
countries because they can dictate
anything they want to these countries
they can even push them into war so
right now what we're seeing is that
these central banks are very worried
about this system that we're in because
their system is breaking down that's
what they're worried about and they're
looking to protect it in any way they
possibly can now the central bank of all
central banks the biz they're separating
themselves from all of this and there's
a reason for this is because they sit on
the top it's like the main Rothschild
banking system where they oversee
everything and they don't care about
their little piddly you know branches of
central banks around the world because
they can be replaced in a second and
they'll just call it
therefore name they've done this in the
past even here in the United States
where they where they've had many
different central banks in America
wasn't called the Federal Reserve they
were called by other names and they've
also had central banks in other
countries so they don't care about that
because they understand if they're
intact on the very top level all they
need to do at that point they say yeah
those systems are corrupt you know this
is why it happened they'll separate
themselves and then they'll basically
create a new system and that's really
what they wanted to do now they were
gonna do it in a completely different
way but now they have no alternative but
to embrace what is happening and point
the finger most likely at Trump and
that's what they're doing right now
they're pointing the finger in that
direction they're preparing for what is
coming and they know eventually what's

to rip the globalists the central

central banks they are warning about

listen everyone thanks a lot for
